entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having a snake on his shoulders.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: A character who is part of Voldemort's conversation and seems to be intimidated by him.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy's son, described as being terrified of Voldemort.

entities.name: lucius malfoy's wife
entities.description: The wife of Lucius Malfoy, who is described as making a stiï¬€ nod and averting her eyes from Voldemort.

entities.name: the dark woman
entities.description: A character who speaks halfway down the table, but no further description is given.

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: A huge snake that emerges from beneath the table and rests on Voldemort's shoulders.

relationships.description: Voldemort is looking at Lucius Malfoy, who seems to be intimidated by him.
The snake rests on Voldemort's shoulders, and he strokes it with his fingers.
Lucius Malfoy seems to be intimidated by Voldemort, as evidenced by his shaking hand and averted eyes.
Draco Malfoy is terrified of Voldemort, as evidenced by his quick glances away from him.
